Entertainers and icons from entertainment houses such as the Hamisfore Theatorium on @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.Item.hepqXl6gFvs5sDQu]{Absalom Station} to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.Item.0VTtBYDJC5vUC434]{Eox}â€™s Halls of the Living understand the importance of showmanship. From a famous mentor or through your own inventiveness, you have developed a minor magical trick to entertain or distract.

Prerequisites: Cha 11.

Benefit: Select one of the following 0-level spells:dancing lights,ghost sound, or token spell. You can cast this spell three times per day as a spell-like ability, using your character level as your caster level. The key ability score for this spell is Charisma.

Special: You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you must choose a different spell from the list.
